titleStmt.title: The articles recommended by the Arch-Bishop of Canterbvry to all the bishops within his metropolitan jurisdiction, the 16th of July, 1688
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1678-1690 : Sancroft)
Sancroft, William, 1617-1693.

notesStmt.note: Folger copy dated "London, July 27, 1688"; Copy described in McAlpin catalog, matches filmed copy and is dated "Lambeth July 27, 1688".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
